Reviews.Title: Excellent Laptop.
Reviews.Author: Mutzin
Reviews.Content: Excellent gaming laptop.  I have three Cyberpower computers.  I love them all.  I did have a problem with one.  I contacted the company, they issued me an immediate RMA number and I sent it in for service.  They replaced the motherboard at no cost to me in a timely manner.  I bought this one off Amazon because it met my needs and I could get it overnight with Amazon's excellent fast delivery.  This one had Windows 8 which I upgraded to 8.1 with no problem.

Reviews.Title: Very well built, excellent performance
Reviews.Author: RadioFrequency "RF"
Reviews.Content: Couldn't be happier. The build quality is excellent, no problem so far, no overheating issue or anything of the sort. Runs all recent games on ultra setting 1080p without a hitch.

Reviews.Title: Nice gaming laptop but why no camera?
Reviews.Author: T. Kelly "Accident"
Reviews.Content: I've only had my new Fangbook 1 day so it is a little early to give much of a review.  My only disappointment so far is that this model from Amazon does not include a webcam.  If you look at the close-up above the display, it looks like it might have one but it doesn't.  Even my cheap little Toshiba had a decent camera built-in.  Other than that, you can feel the heat on your lap when gaming but that would be expected.  I got myself the "Blue LED 10-Inch to 17-Inch Laptop Notebook Cooling Cooler Stand Pad" (B0089V3WDO  The laptop came very well packaged.  A box within a box with spacing, within another box with spacing.

Reviews.Title: High Quanlity & Reasonable Price
Reviews.Author: Kai
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best gaming laptops i have ever had. If extortionary say anything, is in the heavy weights.
